name: Aloisius
description:
Aloisius

Defend your kingdom and outwit the AI in Aloisius!

Your subjects act similar to a widely known board game, but you can also construct buildings and harvest natural resources.

Please let us know what you think! What worked for you and what didn't? Which bugs did you encounter? Any technical or resolution issues?
We also love your feedback on the gameplay.

If you have trouble with the resolution, you can always zoom out or in in the browser.

Tools
  • Libgdx with Artemis OBD
  • Aseprite
  • Bfxr
Versions

The jar contains the version that was originally submitted for LD41. The HTML version might receive patches, without adding new features or significantly changing gameplay. Changes so far are

  • added options to turn sound and music off
  • own peasant now has straw hat instead of helmet
  • paladin now costs 25 coin instead of 16
  • Fixed AI not ending turn when it could not find a good move
